resources.string: Two factor authentication (2FA) via sms has been deprecated by NIST and it is appropriate for users to use Time based One Time Password (TOTP) for 2FA.
and it is appropriate for users to use Time based One Time Password (TOTP) for 2FA.
Two factor authentication (2FA) via sms has been deprecated by NIST and it is appropriate for users to use Time based One Time Password (TOTP) for 2FA.
Savit authenticator help secure your user accounts with an offline based One Time Password
